title: a song i made

embed.description: First music i've made, really short though. please don't hate me if it's a load of shit

body: a song i made during class, please give me comments on how i can improve. thanks

replies.body: Sounds like something I would pick out of Pokemon (in a cave or so) or in Zelda

very soothing but also kind of scary, song itself sounds beautiful but I think the songs overall theme needs to be picked and stuck with because as I said before it had was soothing but scary at the same time. GJ bro!
your s notes and h notes and i notes and t notes are really %%%%. good thing im not a music geek, i mean, good thing *we* are not music geeks
